testcase.name: _300円の予算内で3つのお菓子データを抽出する
testcase.system-out:
Array ( [0] => 0 [1] => 2 [2] => 4 ) Array ( [0] => Array ( [name] => 飴玉 [price] => 50 )
[1] => Array ( [name] => チョコレート [price] => 88 )
[2] => Array ( [name] => せんべい [price] => 150 )
) Array ( [0] => 0 [1] => 3 [2] => 4 ) Array ( [0] => Array ( [name] => 飴玉 [price] => 50 )
[1] => Array ( [name] => チョコレート [price] => 80 )
[2] => Array ( [name] => ドーナツ [price] => 120 )
)

testcase.name: お菓子データの抽出はランダムである
getSweetsLessThanBudgetでの処理が命名に合致する
getRandomKeysでの処理が命名に合致する
makeCombinationでの処理が命名に合致する
testcase.system-out:
Array ( [0] => Array ( [name] => 飴玉 [price] => 50 )
[1] => Array ( [name] => ポテトチップス [price] => 160 )
[2] => Array ( [name] => ドーナツ [price] => 120 )
)
